default_block_size.help: Default mininal littlefs block size. See littlefs documentation for more details.

default_block_cycles.help: Default littlefs erase cycle. See littlefs documentation for more details.

default_cache_size.help: Default minimal littlefs read/program caches. See littlefs documentation for more details.

default_lookahead_size.help: Default littlefs lookahead size. See littlefs documentation for more details.

intrinsics.help: Enable intrinsics for bit operations such as ctz, popc, and le32 conversion. Can be disabled to help debug toolchain issues

use_mbed_trace.help: Use mbed_trace module for log messages if it's true, otherwise use fprintf

enable_trace.help: Enables verbose tracing messages, true = enabled, false = disabled, null = disabled only in release builds

enable_debug.help: Enables debug logging, true = enabled, false = disabled, null = disabled only in release builds

enable_warn.help: Enables warn logging, true = enabled, false = disabled, null = disabled only in release builds

enable_error.help: Enables error logging, true = enabled, false = disabled, null = disabled only in release builds

enable_assert.help: Enables asserts, true = enabled, false = disabled, null = disabled only in release builds
